instruction: Convince your reader to vote for Joe Biden.
output: Joe Biden has spent his entire career fighting for working people, strengthening the middle class, and making sure everyone has a fair shot to succeed. As President, he’ll take on the toughest challenges and make the bold changes necessary to build a more equitable, just, and prosperous future. He’ll raise wages, invest in infrastructure, deliver universal health care, strengthen our schools, and tackle the climate crisis. He’ll ensure hard work is rewarded and give everyone a fair shake. He believes in treating people with dignity and respect, and his plans will reflect that. A vote for Joe Biden is a vote for a better future for all of us.
